general_advisory: Start sowing kharif crops when the monsoon gives a cumulative rainfall of more than 70 mm.

advisory: Choose the variety according to land type and resource available. The variety like Swarna Shreya of 115-125 days.
Aromatic paddy like New Kalajeera and Kalajeera, Nua Acharmati.
Harvest the crop at maturity stage. Avoid over maturity.
After the monsoon rainfall, start sowing different pulses in the field.
Choose good varieties like Arjuna, Kalua, Sriprava @ 4 kg/ac.
Choose good varieties are Kalinga Maize, Prabal, etc @ 6 kg/ac.
Chose good varieties like Dharani, Smruti, Kadri -6, Kalinga groundnut @ 75 kg/acre of pod.
Collect good quality ginger Rhizomes namely Suprava, Suruchi, Suravi.
Sow good varieties like Roma, Suroma, Ranga and Rashmi.
Provide the animal shed clean and sufficient drinking water.
Due to temperature effect in brinjal, manage Foot & Shoot borer with Neem based pesticides 330 ppm @ 1 liter per acre.
Seed rate is 8-10 q/ac. The seed material should be of 150-200 g.
